name: Pew Pew (AndrewJRabbitt)
description:
This is my first game, a fast paced 2D top-down space shooter named Pew Pew!

The music was composed by maxstack on opengameart.org (CC BY-SA 3.0).

Assets were kindly created and provided by Kenney at kenney.nl/

Audio was made by Kenney, myself, and TheAnnoyedTaco.

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD or arrow keys
Shoot: Space bar.

That's it! I hope you enjoy the game!

Note that clicking quit on the main menu closes the webapp and you'll have to refresh the page to restart the game.
